function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited evaluation and assessment of building automation and control systems (BACS) design and operation","Impact":"Ineffective BACS operation, leading to inefficient energy consumption and suboptimal building performance","Mitigation":"Implement thorough evaluation and assessment of BACS design and operation, invest in user-friendly and comprehensive tools for decision-making","Technologies":"Building automation and control system software, energy monitoring systems","People":"Building owners, facility managers, energy consultants","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, energy consultants"},{"Description":"Outdated BACS in healthcare buildings in Denmark","Impact":"Limited functionalities and features, inefficient energy consumption, suboptimal building performance","Mitigation":"Retrofit outdated BACS with modern, energy-efficient systems, invest in comprehensive building automation and control systems","Technologies":"Building automation and control system software, energy-efficient systems","People":"Healthcare facility managers, building owners, technology suppliers","Owner":"Healthcare facility managers, building owners, technology suppliers"}]}
